input.sentences: we were at a birthday party with cake !
people were being silly and holding up masks to their faces .
they were giving out zebra plushes as party favors because it was her favorite animal .

output.sentences: Today I was invited to a Birthday party and the cake was amazing.
We all had to pose with these silly masks.
The theme was a zebra party with lots of plush toys.
It was so hard to cut into the cake because because it was so beautiful.
We handed the birthday girl so me balloons.
